thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: Liana Schapiro

author: Liana Schapiro
title: Liana Schapiro
text: Having just started the process with Lencred, I have really appreciated the helpful guidance of Gary, my Small Business Resource Specialist. Instead of hounding me with phone calls like so many other companies have, Gary has been very polite, respectful of my time, and excited to share any information with me that I request. I am excited to see where the lending process goes, but so far Lencred has been a pleasure to deal with. Thanks Gary!
